title: Overloading Rust Macros with macro_rules!
description: In this lab, you will learn how macros can be overloaded in Rust using the macro_rules! syntax, allowing them to accept different combinations of arguments.

meta.title: Rust Macro Overloading | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to overload macros in Rust using the macro_rules! syntax, allowing them to accept different combinations of arguments.
meta.keywords: Rust, Macros, Overloading, Programming Tutorials, Coding
